originalText.text:
Awesome class. Not only have my son and I enjoyed the benefits of learning and training, but the atmosphere of the class is uniquely balanced - a rarity for martial arts classes. Sensei Val does an amazing job of making sure everyone is posted on details of the art while also maintaining a culture of respect that is as sincere as it is fun. I‚Äôll leave 10 stars!

originalText.text: Yeung Sensei is truly a gifted and passionate not only as a swordsman but as a teacher as well! He truly cares for the improvement of his students and does not horse around when it comes to executing technique. He has a great reputation in the ryushin shouchi ryu organization and is probably the best teacher for swordsmanship in general. If you want to learn true swordsmanship, then you cannot go wrong coming to Ryushin Kan.

originalText.text:
After a long search for Japanese iaijutsu/kenjutsu dojo in NYC, I feel blissful to find Ryushin Kan. I cannot express enough how much I enjoy my training at this school. Sensei Valiant is an exceptionally knowledgeable and gifted instructor and so is his team.
If you want to learn a highly refined form of martial art in a friendly atmosphere, this school is your place to be !!

text.text:

originalText.text: I have to say I was thoroughly impressed by Ryushin Kan. I‚Äôve searched for a space to train for Iaido for sometime and I‚Äôm glad I decided on this particular one. Sensei Valiant leads class with ease and is very willing to assist students with learning the craft. It‚Äôs apparent that Sensei holds great reverence for the martial art and it shows through his teaching style. The other group members are congenial, welcoming, and enjoyable people to learn beside. I definitely would recommend this school!

Sensei Valiant leads class with ease and is very willing to assist students with learning the craft. I definitely would recommend this school!

originalText.text:
My son has been taking Iaido lessons under the excellent tutelage of Sensei Valiant and his team. It‚Äôs been a on all fronts a transformative experience, the support and learnings the school imparts ,is underpinned by the belief of teaching to share knowledge, rather than as a business.
This has an immensely positive impact on all students ,including my son,who is honing his sword skills and understanding the importance of employing both his mind and body to the task.
